string.text: The first truly mass intermediate (between pistol and rifle) cartridge was developed in the USSR in 1943 to provide troops able to fight fire with automatic small arms at ranges of 200-400 meters. This popularity gained by Kalashnikov assault rifle. Used in the AK-47, AK-104, AK-203.
Army ammunition with a bullet to the heat-treated core (high probiaemosti) for AK-47, AK-104, AK-203.
Base ammunition for the pistol 'Desert Eagle', Colt 1911, SIG 220 and USP. Simple core, shell bullet.
Hydra-Shok - cartridge with improved characteristics for guns 'Desert Eagle', Colt 1911, SIG 220 and USP. Expansive bullet, have good stopping power.

The usual round of 12 gauge, filled 6 mm fraction. At close range has a huge killer action. Designed for shotgun TOZ-34, BM-16, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. It is most effective at ranges up to 30 meters.
Feathered bullet, stabilizing in flight, which is good for accuracy. Shotgun TOZ-34, BM-16, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. Increase the range and armor. It is effective at ranges up to 150 meters.

Cartridge with heavy nonenveloped bullet. Typically used for hunting large animals, but is also suitable for other purposes. Its heavy bullet pierces, and actually pushes the body armor. Designed for shotgun TOZ-34, BM-16, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. It is effective at ranges up to 100 meters.
Armor-piercing bullets for automatic AKS-74, AKS-74U, AH-94. Improved armor-piercing bullets ability.
The standard cartridge for AKS-74, AKS-74U, AH-94. Simple core, shell bullet.
Cartridge with armor-piercing bullets for assault rifles Enfield L85 A2, LR300, SIG 550, HK G36, FN F2000.
Standard NATO cartridge, commonly known under the Belgian index SS109. Assault rifle used in Enfield L85 A2, LR300, SIG 550, HK G36, FN F2000.
7.62x54 7H1 - cheap to produce modification sniper cartridge for sniper rifles SVD, SVU-C-IED AC and CB-98. \n bullet cartridges has lead core.

7.62x54 7H14 - Modernization of Army sniper cartridge, the bullet is lighter compared to the standard 7.62x54R patron, in this sniper cartridges offer the best accuracy of fire. \n is used in sniper rifles SVD, SVU-C-IED AC and CB-98.

7.62x54 7H13 - chuck 7.62x54mm sample 1908. enhanced penetration. Designed to engage manpower, located behind the light armor disguises, at ranges up to 800 m \n has a steel core of high carbon steel. \n For the SVD sniper rifle, IED-C-IED AC and CB-98.
Basic cartridge for pistols PM, PB, Fort 12. Simple core, shell bullet. Weak ArmorPiercing action.
Cartridge with improved ballistic performance for pistols PM, PB, Fort 12. Due to the higher muzzle velocity is much more efficient than conventional cartridge. More pronounced piercing effect.
Basic cartridge for Walther P99 pistol and submachine gun HK MP5K-N. Bullet shell. Weak ArmorPiercing action.
Cartridge with improved characteristics for Walther P99 pistol and submachine gun HK MP5K-N. Powerful cartridge with expansive bullet and armor-piercing core.

Armor-piercing bullets for automatic machines 'storm', 'Shaft' and BCC 'Vintorez'. Due to the special design poluobolochenoy bullets penetrate any body armor, even at extreme distances, but has a higher dispersion than 9x39 Sniper SP-5.
Ammo for 'Storm'. Cheaper to manufacture modified cartridge 9x39, also suitable for the AU 'Shaft' and BCC 'Vintorez', but quickly their 'scores.'
Specially designed for automatic sniper cartridge 'storm', 'Shaft' and BCC 'Vintorez'. Excellent performance on accuracy.
Energy capacity with ready-killer 9 mm elements for the Gauss rifle (10 pieces in the store). Energy source is encapsulated fragment artifact 'Flash.'
Shot for a grenade launcher M-203 (rifles LR300, SIG 550, HK G36) and for integrated grenade FN F2000.
High-explosive shot for RPG-7V. Equally effective against manpower and against advanced technology.
Shot for the grenade launcher GP-25 'Fire', an integrated grenade launcher 'Thunderstorm' and revolving grenade RG-6.

Shot for the grenade launcher GP-25 'Fire', an integrated grenade launcher 'Thunderstorm' and revolving grenade RG-6. Before the explosion shot bounces to a height of about one meter, which increases its lethality.
Hand grenades with a large radius shrapnel. Throwing only recommended from the shelter.
Hand smoke grenade. Designed for installation of flue cover. Duration - 10 seconds.
Offensive hand grenade with a small radius of shrapnel.

 APS pistol was developed in the late 1940s - early 1950s designer Ya Stechkin and adopted by the Soviet Army in 1951, along with the Makarov PM pistol. Compared with the PM APS provides substantially more fire power and combat effectiveness through increased magazine capacity and a longer barrel. If necessary, from the MTA can fire bursts, and thanks to the moderator, the rate of fire, the gun is more or less manageable. In the early 80s was removed from service the SA, and in its place came a pistol APB (automatic pistol silent).
